title: GeoJSON Properties
description: Schema describing the GeoJSON properties per 3D-tile group

name.description: Human readable name for the properties schema

semantic.description: An high-level identifier that define the meaning of the properties. Recommended best practice is to select a value from a controlled vocabulary or formal classification scheme.

type.description: Type of GeoJSON geometry inside the group

properties.description: An array of metadata properties in the specified group

description.description: Human readable description of the property.

max.description: Maximum allowed value for the property. Only applicable to integer and float types.

min.description: Minimum allowed value for the property. Only applicable to integer and float types.

required.description: If required, the property shall be present in every entity conforming to the feature.

default.description: A default value to use when encountering an omitted property. Shall not be defined if `required` is true.

semantic.description: An identifier that describes how this property should be interpreted. The semantic cannot be used by other properties in the properties schema.
